= Level 1 Heading: Moin Syntax Highlighting Test =
<<TableOfContents(4)>>
== Level 2 Heading: Formatting ==
=== Level 3 Heading: Formatting at beginning of line: ===
''italic''
'''bold'''
`monospace`
__underline__
--(stroke)--
~-smaller-~
~+larger+~
^super^script
,,sub,,script

normal ~-smaller-~ normal ~+larger+~ normal

==== Level 4 Heading ====
===== Level 5 Heading =====
=== Level 3 Heading: Formatting in the middle of a line, single character only: ===
start ''I''talic    end
start '''B'''old    end
start `M`onospace   end
start __U__nderline end
start --(S)--troke  end
start ~-s-~maller   end
start ~+L+~arger    end
start ^S^uperscript end
start ,,S,,ubscript end
== Level 2 Heading with WikiWord: Table with formatting ==

||<rowbgcolor="#AAAAAA"> no formatting ||<|4> Hallo ''italic'' huhu	  ||
|| no formatting || '''bold'''	  ||
|| no formatting || `monospace`	  ||
|| no formatting || __underline__ ||
|| no formatting || --(stroke)--  ||
|| no formatting but {{{code in table}}} || ~-smaller-~	  ||
|| no formatting || ~+larger+~	  ||
|| no formatting || ^super^script ||
|| no formatting || ,,sub,,script ||

== Level 2 Heading: Environments ==
{{{Code at beginning of line}}}
